noun.description: A lungless salamander of the family Plethodontidae.

adjective.description: Of or relating to the family Plethodontidae of lungless salamanders.

origin: 1920s; earliest use found in American Naturalist. From scientific Latin Plethodontidae, family name from Plethodont-, taken as stem (after ancient Greek ὀδοντ-, ὀδούς tooth) of Plethodon, genus name + -idae.
